page.title: 08RELIGIOUS SURVEY
page.content: Our class carried out a religious survey in Maldon because in the town there are eight different churches for a variety of religious denominations and two church of Englands.We asked 100 people the following questions 1)Have you a religion?If so what? 2)Were you born into a family with religious convictions?Yes/No 3)Do you attend church regularly?What church do you go to? 65% of those interviewed belonged to the Church of England,14% Catholic and in descending order 4% Methodist,3% Baptist,2% Congregational and 1% Pent- costal.11% had no religious beliefs. All Saints Church-the oldest and larg- est church had the greatest congrega- tion. About 3/4 of those interviewed went to church regularly.Others went at baptisms,weddings and funerals.
